channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: More abandoned Highways flytipping, 5th November
item.description:
Yet another pile, reported numerous times, still ignored. Bypass between Gloucester Business Park & Zoons Court roundabout. In total there are now FIVE lots of Highways "litter" to be collected off this bypass. Tantamount to commercial flytipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Freshly left abandoned signage etc, 5th November
item.description:
Yet another pile, this one freshly left! Broken cone bases, cones, sandbags, lights, signs right in edge of bypass at Zoons Court roundabout as you enter bypass towards the Biz Park. Bypass between Gloucester Business Park & Zoons Court roundabout. In total there are now FIVE lots of Highways "litter" to be collected off this bypass. Tantamount to commercial flytipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: There are 3 large foam filled sofa covers dumped in Prestbury Road, 4th November
item.description:
There are 3 large foam filled covers that have been dumped behind an Open Reach Broadband installation. They have been there ages and I walk past everyday with my dog and it's annoying. It is opposite the Prestbury Car Valeting Service which is next to Selim Smith Funeral Directors. Please could you make arrangements to have them taken away...thank you ...
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 267, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement in pitch darkness just past Oark Housr 39 Park Place, hazardous to pedestrians, almost collided with man sat on bench earlier as I did not see him., 4th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Park Place, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Barbed wire next to PROW, 4th November
item.description:
Land owner as part of the planning application for a housing development at stoke orchard has fenced off certain areas near the PROW. However one has been done using barbed wire strung within a hedge and is extremely dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Zura Drive, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
